data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended December 31, 2022 For The Financial Year 2022-23, Limited Review Report And Press Release
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed the unaudited financial results of the Company, on consolidated as well as standalone basis, for the quarter ended December 31, 2022, as reviewed by the Audit Committee and approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held today i.e January 30, 2023 which concluded at 02.40 p.m.

Further, the Limited Review Reports of the Auditors of the Company on the unaudited financial results of the Company (both on consolidated and standalone basis) and the press communication, which is being released simultaneously to the media, are also attached.

With reference to our letter dated December 30, 2022 please note the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company by the Insiders, as defined under the SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 shall re-open from Thursday, February 02, 2023.

Please take the same on your record.
